reportProtocol.title: User Experience Improvement Plan
reportProtocol.content:
To better improve your experience, continuously identify and fix issues, this feature will automatically upload anonymous information. These only include:

ğŸ“Œ Program exceptions: such as crashes, error codes, etc.
ğŸ“Œ Performance data: e.g., download speed, operation response time, feature usage frequency (anonymous).

This process will never collect or upload any personally identifiable information, file contents, chat logs, passwords, or browsing history.

You can turn off this protocol at any time in Settings

updateTips.title: Version Update Notes
updateTips.content:
ğŸ“Œ New AI Mark feature: let AI remember any file to help you find it faster later or ask questions.
ğŸ“Œ OCR feature: to save computer resources, visual indexing is now provided by OCR service: it extracts text from images only, no longer using AI models to summarize images. If needed, use AI Mark for images.
ğŸ“Œ Added context menu: you can right-click on search results to use AI Mark.

aiMark.title: Or you may need AI Mark
aiMark.requireTitle: AI Mark requires the following components
aiMark.successTitle: Congrats! AI Mark is now active

step1.entry: Start AI Mark from context menu
step1.desc: Let AI mark this file, and AI will understand and analyze it. With AI's understanding, you'll find the file more easily later:

step1.ask: ğŸ“– Ask questions: you can ask questions about the file (coming soon).
